title: Cap Crown, ca. 1820
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Central floral spray design in varied stitches. Tiny two-leaved motifs powdered over ground.

Technique: needlework on net. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-95.
